description: Use a different filesystem as the root of the mount tree. Note: switch_root will fail to function if the new root is not the root of a mount. Use bind-mounting as a workaround. See also: chroot, mount. More information: https://manned.org/switch_root.8.

useCases.description: Move /proc, /dev, /sys and /run to the specified filesystem, use this filesystem as the new root and start the specified init process:
